title: Riven Q
body: Is there a way to make it so it goes where your mouse is? (Like Nidalee)

replies.body: looks like rivens broken, i think everyone needs to stop playing her and riot should disable her until we fix the issue of riven mains.
No, unless your mouse is over an enemy.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing

Basically if you put your mouse cursor over a target minior or champion you will turn and Q in that direction 
http://i.imgur.com/F13NDpu.png

Um... depending on where your mouse is, you Q in that direction.
If that answers your question.
No Riven's q goes where Riven is facing, it's annoying. I'm asking if there is away to change it so it is like Nidalee's dash ability so that it does goes where your mouse is.
Unless your not using quick cast, then it definitely goes the direction of the mouse, however it can also go short if you are targeting something (go watch boxbox if you want some info for riven)

Riven's Q does not go in the direction of the mouse unless hovering over an enemy unit etc. Otherwise her Q simply goes the way she is facing. Using her E sets her to face the direction dashed which makes it easier to use.{{champion:92}}
